24#include "lib.h"
25
26#include <assert.h>
27#include <stdlib.h>
28#include <errno.h>
29#include "font.h"
30#include "searchpath.h"
31#include "device.h"
32#include "defs.h"
33
34const char *const FONT_ENV_VAR = "GROFF_FONT_PATH";
35
36static search_path font_path(FONT_ENV_VAR, FONTPATH, 0, 0);
37
38int font::res = 0;
39int font::hor = 1;
40int font::vert = 1;
41int font::unitwidth = 0;
42int font::paperwidth = 0;
43int font::paperlength = 0;
44const char *font::papersize = 0;
45int font::biggestfont = 0;
46int font::spare2 = 0;
47int font::sizescale = 1;
48int font::tcommand = 0;
49int font::pass_filenames = 0;
50int font::unscaled_charwidths = 0;
51int font::use_charnames_in_special = 0;
52const char *font::image_generator = NULL;
53const char **font::font_name_table = 0;
54int *font::sizes = 0;
55const char *font::family = 0;
56const char **font::style_table = 0;
57FONT_COMMAND_HANDLER font::unknown_desc_command_handler = 0;
58
59void font::command_line_font_dir(const char *dir)
60{
61 font_path.command_line_dir(dir);
62}
63
64FILE *font::open_file(const char *nm, char **pathp)
65{
66 char *filename = new char[strlen(nm) + strlen(device) + 5];
67 sprintf(filename, "dev%s/%s", device, nm);
68 FILE *fp = font_path.open_file(filename, pathp);
69 a_delete filename;
70 return fp;
71}
